Title: Turn it off
Description: Turn off your lights when you leave the room

Title: Take the stairs
Description: If you can take the stairs instead of the elevator

Title: Unplug
Description: Unplug your electronics when you aren't using them

Title: LED Bulbs
Description: Switch to CFL light bulbs that are more efficient

Title: Loaded Laundry
Description: Only do full loads of laundry and use colors cycle when possible

Title: Shorter Showers
Description: The less hot water you use the less energy is needed to heat the water

Title: Recycle
Description: Recycle carefully so that aluminum cans, plastic, glass, and paper are properly handled

Title: Reuse
Description: Donate old electronics , furniture, and school supplies rather than throwing them out

Title: Ride a bike
Description: For small distances try riding a bike instead of driving

Title: Take public transport
Description: If possible take public transportation like busses or the subway instead of driving
